1PT1.SG.summary: Central Pattana Public Company Limited develops and manages real estate properties primarily in Thailand. The company develops and rents shopping centers; office buildings; hotel; residential building; and food court, as well as invests in property leasehold funds and trust, and offers property management services. As of December 31, 2019, its property portfolio comprised 34 shopping centers, 7 office buildings, 2 hotels, and 1 rental housing project and accommodation project. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Central Pattana Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Chirathivat Group.

2PR3.F.summary: Pruksa Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of residential real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops townhouses, single houses, and condominiums. It also provides management, home decoration, and construction services; and operates hospitals and clinics, as well as place of examination and treatment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

2PR4.SG.summary: Pruksa Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of residential real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops townhouses, single houses, and condominiums. It also provides management, home decoration, and construction services; and operates hospitals and clinics, as well as place of examination and treatment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

A-R.BK.summary: Areeya Property Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops real estate projects in Thailand. It primarily develops single-homes, village towns, townhomes, home offices, and condominiums; and community malls. The company is also involved in the provision of after sales services for property; construction services; and property management services, as well as in the restaurant business. Areeya Property Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

A.BK.summary: Areeya Property Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops real estate projects in Thailand. It primarily develops single-homes, village towns, townhomes, home offices, and condominiums; and community malls. The company is also involved in the provision of after sales services for property; construction services; and property management services, as well as in the restaurant business. Areeya Property Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIMIRT.BK.long_name: AIM Industrial Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
AIMIRT.BK.summary: AIM Industrial Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust focuses on investing in freehold right of land, cold storage buildings, and immovable assets related to cold storage and warehouses in Thailand. These are located in Samut Sakhon and Chachoengsao areas with total leasable area of 36,908.00 sq.m. It also intends to invest in freehold right of land and warehouses, including 5 units of warehouses with total leasable area of 21,651 sq.m. in Bang Phi, Samut Prakan. The company is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ALL-R.BK.long_name: All Inspire Development Public Company Limited
ALL-R.BK.summary: All Inspire Development Public Company Limited engages in the development of real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops condominiums and townhomes. It also provides condominium management and real estate brokerage services. In addition, the company engages in the leasing and rental of shopping malls. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMATA-R.BK.summary: Amata Corporation Public Company Limited plans, develops, manages, and markets integrated industrial estates in Thailand and internationally. It also produces, distributes, and treats water for industrial use; provides management services for common area; operates a school; and constructs factory for rent. In addition, the company operates as a REIT manager. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMATA.BK.summary: Amata Corporation Public Company Limited plans, develops, manages, and markets integrated industrial estates in Thailand and internationally. It also produces, distributes, and treats water for industrial use; provides management services for common area; operates a school; and constructs factory for rent. In addition, the company operates as a REIT manager. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMATAR.BK.long_name: Amata Summit Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
AMATAR.BK.summary: Amata Summit Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by Amata Summit REIT Management Co., Ltd. It invests in the real estate markets. Amata Summit Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMATAV-R.BK.summary: Amata VN Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development of industrial estate in Vietnam. It is also involved in the leasing of industrial land, ready built factories, and commercial and residential land, as well as office rental activities. In addition, the company provides utility services. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Amata VN Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Amata Corporation Public Company Limited.

AMATAV.BK.summary: Amata VN Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development of industrial estate in Vietnam. It is also involved in the leasing of industrial land, ready built factories, and commercial and residential land, as well as office rental activities. In addition, the company provides utility services. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Amata VN Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Amata Corporation Public Company Limited.

ANAN-R.BK.summary: Ananda Development Public Company Limited, together with subsidiaries, develops and sells various real estate projects in Thailand. It operates through Real Estate Development, Management of Real Estate Development Project, Construction Service, and Other segments. The company provides management services for real estate projects; house construction services; and car racetrack, real estate brokerage, sport club member, and other services, as well as sells food and beverages. It is also involved in the management of juristic person; manufacture and distribution of building materials; development of software; and media production activities, as well as provides academic seminar services. Further, the company engages in the provision of property rental and procurement of lessee services. Ananda Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

ANAN.BK.summary: Ananda Development Public Company Limited, together with subsidiaries, develops and sells various real estate projects in Thailand. It operates through Real Estate Development, Management of Real Estate Development Project, Construction Service, and Other segments. The company provides management services for real estate projects; house construction services; and car racetrack, real estate brokerage, sport club member, and other services, as well as sells food and beverages. It is also involved in the management of juristic person; manufacture and distribution of building materials; development of software; and media production activities, as well as provides academic seminar services. Further, the company engages in the provision of property rental and procurement of lessee services. Ananda Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

AP-R.BK.summary: AP (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development activities in Thailand. The company operates in three segments: Low Â Rise, High Â Rise, and Other. It develops single detached houses, townhouses, and condominiums; and provides after sales, property brokerage, and construction services. AP (Thailand) Public Company Limited is also involved in the education and training businesses. The company was formerly known as Asian Property Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to AP (Thailand) Public Company Limited in May 2013. AP (Thailand) Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AQ-R.BK.summary: AQ Estate Public Company Limited acquires, develops, and sells properties in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Property Development Low Rise, Property Development High Rise, Services, and Property Rental and Service. The company provides recreational and sale management services; operates hotels and resorts; manages commercial space; and provides real estate trading and rental services. The company was formerly known as Krisdamahanakorn Public Company Limited and changed its name to AQ Estate Public Company Limited in April 2014. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ARIN-R.BK.summary: Arinsiri Land Public company limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Chonburi, Thailand.

ARIN.BK.summary: Arinsiri Land Public company limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Chonburi, Thailand.

B52-R.BK.summary: B-52 Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in the trading of consumer products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Trading of Consumer Products, E-Commerce, and Real Estate. It also provides e-commerce trading of goods and services through an online application abcpoint; and provides financial settlement services under WeChat and Alipay, as well as invests in real estate. The company was formerly known as Digital Tech Planet Public Company Limited and changed its name to B-52 Capital Public Company Limited in May 2019. B-52 Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

B52.BK.summary: B-52 Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in the trading of consumer products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Trading of Consumer Products, E-Commerce, and Real Estate. It also provides e-commerce trading of goods and services through an online application abcpoint; and provides financial settlement services under WeChat and Alipay, as well as invests in real estate. The company was formerly known as Digital Tech Planet Public Company Limited and changed its name to B-52 Capital Public Company Limited in May 2019. B-52 Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

BC-R.BK.summary: Boutique Corporation Public Company Limited designs, develops, manages, and sells real estate solutions in the hospitality, retail, and commercial sectors to institutional investors in Thailand. It is involved in real estate development, such as serviced residences, hotel operations, and community mall, as well as sale of real estate projects and real estate investment management activities. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BC.BK.summary: Boutique Corporation Public Company Limited designs, develops, manages, and sells real estate solutions in the hospitality, retail, and commercial sectors to institutional investors in Thailand. It is involved in real estate development, such as serviced residences, hotel operations, and community mall, as well as sale of real estate projects and real estate investment management activities. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BKER.BK.long_name: Bualuang K.E.Retail Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
BKER.BK.summary: Bualuang K.E.Retail Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust specializes in real estate investments.

BLAND-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Land Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development, exhibition and convention, food and beverage, and hotel investment businesses in Thailand. It also provides financing services; project and infrastructure management services; building management and maintenance services; and real estate investment trust management services, as well as rents properties. In addition, the company is involved in the retail business, as well as in the issuance of bonds. Bangkok Land Public Company Limited is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

BLAND.BK.summary: Bangkok Land Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development, exhibition and convention, food and beverage, and hotel investment businesses in Thailand. It also provides financing services; project and infrastructure management services; building management and maintenance services; and real estate investment trust management services, as well as rents properties. In addition, the company is involved in the retail business, as well as in the issuance of bonds. Bangkok Land Public Company Limited is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

BROCK-R.BK.long_name: Baan Rock Garden Public Company Limited
BROCK-R.BK.summary: Baan Rock Garden Public Company Limited engages in real estate development activities in the Bangkok, Phuket, and Samutprakarn, Thailand. It develops residential projects under the Baan Rock Garden brand. The company was formerly known as Chucheep South Group, Co., Ltd. Baan Rock Garden Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

BROCK.BK.long_name: Baan Rock Garden Public Company Limited
BROCK.BK.summary: Baan Rock Garden Public Company Limited engages in real estate development activities in the Bangkok, Phuket, and Samutprakarn, Thailand. It develops residential projects under the Baan Rock Garden brand. The company was formerly known as Chucheep South Group, Co., Ltd. Baan Rock Garden Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

CGD-R.BK.long_name: Country Group Development Public Company Limited
CGD-R.BK.summary: Country Group Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development business in Thailand and internationally. The company trades, rents, and operates real estate properties; wholesales equipment and furniture used in construction; and manages real estate properties. It also engages in the construction business. The company was formerly known as Dragon One Public Company Limited and changed its name to Country Group Development Public Company Limited in May 2010. Country Group Development Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CI-R.BK.long_name: Charn Issara Development Public Company Limited
CI-R.BK.summary: Charn Issara Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in real estate development activities in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Real Estate Development, Lease of Office Condominium, Hotel Operations, and Sale Goods. It develops and sells residential properties, such as single-detached houses, townhomes, condominiums, and luxury villas; operates spas and hotels; sells or leases office condominiums; and provides REIT management services. The company also engages in the dining and entertainment activities. Charn Issara Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

CI.BK.long_name: Charn Issara Development Public Company Limited
CI.BK.summary: Charn Issara Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in real estate development activities in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Real Estate Development, Lease of Office Condominium, Hotel Operations, and Sale Goods. It develops and sells residential properties, such as single-detached houses, townhomes, condominiums, and luxury villas; operates spas and hotels; sells or leases office condominiums; and provides REIT management services. The company also engages in the dining and entertainment activities. Charn Issara Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

CMC-R.BK.summary: Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited engages in the real estate development activities in Thailand. The company develops lands, single detached houses, townhouses, and condominium units. It also offers construction services; leases space in office building; and engages in the furniture and wall manufacturing business. Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CMC.BK.summary: Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited engages in the real estate development activities in Thailand. The company develops lands, single detached houses, townhouses, and condominium units. It also offers construction services; leases space in office building; and engages in the furniture and wall manufacturing business. Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CPN-R.BK.summary: Central Pattana Public Company Limited develops and manages real estate properties primarily in Thailand. The company develops and rents shopping centers; office buildings; hotel; residential building; and food court, as well as invests in property leasehold funds and trust, and offers property management services. As of December 31, 2019, its property portfolio comprised 34 shopping centers, 7 office buildings, 2 hotels, and 1 rental housing project and accommodation project. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Central Pattana Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Chirathivat Group.

CPN.BK.summary: Central Pattana Public Company Limited develops and manages real estate properties primarily in Thailand. The company develops and rents shopping centers; office buildings; hotel; residential building; and food court, as well as invests in property leasehold funds and trust, and offers property management services. As of December 31, 2019, its property portfolio comprised 34 shopping centers, 7 office buildings, 2 hotels, and 1 rental housing project and accommodation project. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Central Pattana Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Chirathivat Group.

CPNREIT.BK.summary: CPN Retail Growth Leasehold REIT (ÂCPNREITÂ) is Thailand's largest retail-focused real estate investment trust listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand (ÂSETÂ). CPNREIT was established from the conversion of CPN Retail Growth Leasehold Property Fund (ÂCPNRFÂ) which was set up and publicly traded on the SET since 2005. Upon conversion on 1 December 2017, CPNREIT acquired all CPNRF's quality portfolio, and invested in a new mix-used project consisting of CentralFestival Pattaya Beach shopping center and Hilton Pattaya. At present, CPNREIT invested in a well-diversified portfolio of 5 shopping centers and 1 hotel across Thailand's prime destinations.

DHOUSE-R.BK.summary: Dhouse Pattana Public Company Limited engages in the development of real estate properties. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Maha Sarakham, Thailand.

DHOUSE.BK.summary: Dhouse Pattana Public Company Limited engages in the development of real estate properties. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Maha Sarakham, Thailand.

DREIT.BK.long_name: Dusit Thani Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
DREIT.BK.summary: Dusit Thani Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust. The firm focuses on investing in high potential freehold or leasehold properties especially in hotel properties, as well as investing in other assets that favor hotel-related business, such as meeting and convention room, restaurants, fitness center, spa, swimming pool, tennis court etc. The firm is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ESTAR-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Star Real Estate Public Company Limited
ESTAR-R.BK.summary: Eastern Star Real Estate Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates in three segments: Real Estate Business, Golf Course Business, and Rental Business. The company develops and sells land, houses, and residential condominium units; and rents land and units in residential buildings. It also operates golf courses, as well as offers sport memberships. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ESTAR.BK.long_name: Eastern Star Real Estate Public Company Limited
ESTAR.BK.summary: Eastern Star Real Estate Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates in three segments: Real Estate Business, Golf Course Business, and Rental Business. The company develops and sells land, houses, and residential condominium units; and rents land and units in residential buildings. It also operates golf courses, as well as offers sport memberships. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EVER-R.BK.summary: Everland Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development business in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Property Development, and Hospital and Dental Clinic. The company develops land for various residential properties, such as townhouses, single-detached houses, and condominiums. It is also involved in the operation and investment in private hospitals and dental clinics; and provision of land and hospital buildings for rent. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EVER.BK.summary: Everland Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development business in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Property Development, and Hospital and Dental Clinic. The company develops land for various residential properties, such as townhouses, single-detached houses, and condominiums. It is also involved in the operation and investment in private hospitals and dental clinics; and provision of land and hospital buildings for rent. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FPT-R.BK.summary: Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily develops industrial real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops, rents, and sells factories and warehouses, as well as manages 2.8 million square meters of factories and warehouses. It is also involved in the development of commercial and hospitality properties, as well as houses, lands, and mixed-use projects; development of residential properties, including rental and related service of commercial buildings; hotel business; and operation of a golf course. In addition, the company operates and manages serviced apartments, hotels, and office and commercial buildings; and operates as a sponsor and manager of the industrial real estate investment trust in Thailand. Further, it offers data center colocation, smart solutions, investment management, and treasury center development services. The company was formerly known as TICON Industrial Connection Public Company Limited and changed its name to Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited in January 2019. Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

FPT.BK.summary: Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily develops industrial real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops, rents, and sells factories and warehouses, as well as manages 2.8 million square meters of factories and warehouses. It is also involved in the development of commercial and hospitality properties, as well as houses, lands, and mixed-use projects; development of residential properties, including rental and related service of commercial buildings; hotel business; and operation of a golf course. In addition, the company operates and manages serviced apartments, hotels, and office and commercial buildings; and operates as a sponsor and manager of the industrial real estate investment trust in Thailand. Further, it offers data center colocation, smart solutions, investment management, and treasury center development services. The company was formerly known as TICON Industrial Connection Public Company Limited and changed its name to Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited in January 2019. Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

FTREIT.BK.long_name: Ticon Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
FTREIT.BK.summary: Ticon Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by TICON Management Company Limited. The firm acquire, lease and/or sub-lease of immovable properties. It will take the transfer of the ownership and/or leasehold rights and/or sub-leasehold rights therein and seek benefits from those properties by way of lease, sub-lease, transferring and/or disposing of immovable properties the Trust invests in or acquires. Ticon Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust was formed on December 12, 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

GLAND-R.BK.long_name: Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited
GLAND-R.BK.summary: Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited develops real estate properties in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Real Estate for Sale Business, and Real Estate for Rental and Service Business. The Real Estate for Sale Business segment develops land and house, and residential condominium projects. The Real Estate for Rental and Service Business segment rents office buildings. Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited also manages a real estate investment trust; and operates hotels. The company was formerly known as Media of Medias Public Company Limited and changed its name to Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited in May 2010. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of CPN Pattaya Company Limited.

GLAND.BK.long_name: Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited
GLAND.BK.summary: Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited develops real estate properties in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Real Estate for Sale Business, and Real Estate for Rental and Service Business. The Real Estate for Sale Business segment develops land and house, and residential condominium projects. The Real Estate for Rental and Service Business segment rents office buildings. Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited also manages a real estate investment trust; and operates hotels. The company was formerly known as Media of Medias Public Company Limited and changed its name to Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited in May 2010. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of CPN Pattaya Company Limited.

GVREIT.BK.long_name: Golden Ventures Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
GVREIT.BK.summary: Golden Ventures Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust, a real estate investment trust, engages in the rental of properties in Thailand. It holds leasehold rights of Park Ventures Ecoplex building, as well as land and building sub-lease rights of Sathorn Square located at the Central Business District of Thailand. The company has elected to be taxed as a real estate investment trust. As a result, it would not be subject to corporate income tax on that portion of its net income that is distributed to shareholders. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

HNQ.SG.summary: U City Public Company Limited operates as a diversified real estate investment and development company in Thailand and internationally. The company operates in three segments: Hotel Business; Rental and Management Business; and Real Estate for Sale Business. It develops, rents, and sells real estate properties; leases land and structures; invests in securities; and manages and operates golf course and sports club, as well as manages and operates hotels; owns property; and engages in the office rental business. The company was formerly known as Natural Park Public Company Limited and changed its name to U City Public Company Limited in April 2015. U City Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

J-R.BK.summary: JAS Asset Public Company Limited provides rental and related services in Thailand. The company operates in four segments: Rental and Related Services Business, Food and Beverage Business, Real Estate Business and Others. It also organizes rented space for mobile phones and IT products in shopping centers for retail sellers under the IT Junction name; develops and manages community markets and community malls under the J Market, The Jas, and The Jas Urban names; manages food courts and indoor amusement park under the Urban Food Ville and Totem Kingdom brands; and develops properties and condominium projects under the Newera Condominium name. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. JAS Asset Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Jay Mart Public Company Limited.

JAK-R.BK.summary: Jakpaisan Estate Public Company Limited operates as a property developer in Thailand. It specializes in housing estate projects, commercial buildings, and condominiums. The company is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

JAK.BK.summary: Jakpaisan Estate Public Company Limited operates as a property developer in Thailand. It specializes in housing estate projects, commercial buildings, and condominiums. The company is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

JCK-R.BK.summary: JCK International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the property development activities in Thailand and the United Kingdom. It operates through five segments: Land and Factory Building for Sale; Land and Warehouse Building for Rent; Office Building for Rent; Residential Condominium Units for Sale; and REIT Manager. The company develops land for industrial estates; rents office and factory spaces; develops and sells residential condominium units; and provides construction and property management services. It also invests, leases, and sells land and warehouses; and manages a real estate investment trust. The company was formerly known as Thai Factory Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to JCK International Public Company Limited in April 2018. JCK International Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JCK.BK.summary: JCK International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the property development activities in Thailand and the United Kingdom. It operates through five segments: Land and Factory Building for Sale; Land and Warehouse Building for Rent; Office Building for Rent; Residential Condominium Units for Sale; and REIT Manager. The company develops land for industrial estates; rents office and factory spaces; develops and sells residential condominium units; and provides construction and property management services. It also invests, leases, and sells land and warehouses; and manages a real estate investment trust. The company was formerly known as Thai Factory Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to JCK International Public Company Limited in April 2018. JCK International Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JSP-R.BK.summary: J.S.P. Property Public Company Limited primarily engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Real Estate Business and Rental and Service Business. The Real Estate Business segment develops and sells houses, townhouses, commercial buildings, and residence condominium projects, as well as provides property management services to other related companies. The Rental and Service Business segment engages in the rental of community mall and parking lot. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

JSP.BK.summary: J.S.P. Property Public Company Limited primarily engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Real Estate Business and Rental and Service Business. The Real Estate Business segment develops and sells houses, townhouses, commercial buildings, and residence condominium projects, as well as provides property management services to other related companies. The Rental and Service Business segment engages in the rental of community mall and parking lot. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

KUN-R.BK.summary: Villa Kunalai Public Company Limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Bang Bua Thong, Thailand.

KUN.BK.summary: Villa Kunalai Public Company Limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Bang Bua Thong, Thailand.

KWC-R.BK.summary: Krungdhep Sophon Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in developing and leasing of real estate properties in Thailand. The company also engages in the warehouse and wharf business that offers space renting and port of loading/unloading goods services to retail customers. In addition, it provides management consulting, document storage and data management, and computer back-up media storage services. The company was formerly known as Krungdhep Warehouse Company Limited and changed its name to Krungdhep Sophon Public Company Limited in December 1995. Krungdhep Sophon Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

KWC.BK.summary: Krungdhep Sophon Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in developing and leasing of real estate properties in Thailand. In addition, it provides management consulting, document storage and data management, and computer back-up media storage services. The company was formerly known as Krungdhep Warehouse Company Limited and changed its name to Krungdhep Sophon Public Company Limited in December 1995. Krungdhep Sophon Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

LALIN-R.BK.summary: Lalin Property Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the property development activities in Thailand. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

LALIN.BK.summary: Lalin Property Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the property development activities in Thailand. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

LH-R.BK.long_name: Land and Houses Public Company Limited
LH-R.BK.summary: Land and Houses Public Company Limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand and the United States. It operates in two segments, Real Estate Business, and Rental and Service Business. The Real Estate Business segment develops and sells single detached houses, townhouses, and residence condominium projects. The Rental and Service Business segment is involved in the rental of shopping malls, hotels, and apartments. The company also offers project administration and management, and investment advisory services. Land and Houses Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

LHOG.F.long_name: Land and Houses Public Company Limited
LHOG.F.summary: Land and Houses Public Company Limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand and the United States. It operates in two segments, Real Estate Business, and Rental and Service Business. The Real Estate Business segment develops and sells single detached houses, townhouses, and residence condominium projects. The Rental and Service Business segment is involved in the rental of shopping malls, hotels, and apartments. The company also offers project administration and management, and investment advisory services. Land and Houses Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

LHSC.BK.long_name: LH Shopping Centers Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
LHSC.BK.summary: LH Shopping Centers Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by Land and Houses Fund Management Company Limited. The firm invest in the leasehold right in the immovable properties and the ownership in the movable properties in Terminal 21 Shopping Center from L&H Property Company Limited in an approximate total area of 97,905 square meters, for an approximate term of 26 years ending on 31 August 2040. LH Shopping Centers Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

LPN-R.BK.summary: L.P.N. Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops real estate properties in Thailand. It is involved in the development of residential and non-residential condominiums. The company also provides community management services for office and residential condominiums; building engineering services; condominium unit and office space brokerage services; construction management services; and real estate products and services research, development, and consultancy services. In addition, it leases office buildings; and offers security services. L.P.N. Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

LPN.BK.summary: L.P.N. Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops real estate properties in Thailand. It is involved in the development of residential and non-residential condominiums. The company also provides community management services for office and residential condominiums; building engineering services; condominium unit and office space brokerage services; construction management services; and real estate products and services research, development, and consultancy services. In addition, it leases office buildings; and offers security services. L.P.N. Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

MBK-R.BK.summary: MBK Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the shopping center, hotel and tourism, golf, real estate, food, finance, and other businesses in Thailand, the United States, Canada, Europe, and the Asia Pacific. The company provides rental space to retail tenants in the shopping centers; and office rental space. It also offers lodging, food and drink, and other facilities and services related to accommodation and travel; and provision of golf services and clubhouses, as well as sells golf equipment and residential sale, property development and management, building and community management, advisory, and asset appraisal businesses. In addition, the company produces and sells rice for local and export markets; and operates in food center and restaurant, motorcycle hire purchase, and life assurance businesses. Further, it provides car and motorcycle auction services; security, personnel management, construction, and investment services; CRM loyalty programs; land, warehouse, factory building, and car park rental services; and fitness center and inventory trading services. The company was formerly known as MBK Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to MBK Public Company Limited in November 2003. MBK Public Company Limited was founded in 1974 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

MDX-R.BK.summary: MDX Public Company Limited invests in and develops real estate and infrastructure projects. The company operates through three segments: Real Estate, Electricity Generation and Distribution, and Others Business. It also generates and distributes electricity from renewable energy; invests in various electrical power production and distribution projects; and provides investment and financial consulting services. In addition, the company offers land management and rental services. MDX Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MJD-R.BK.summary: Major Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of properties in Thailand. The company operates in three segments: Development of Properties for Sales, Hotel Business, and Rental Business. The company is also involved in the hotel, as well as properties rental and service businesses; and operates as an agent, representative, and advisor of real estate properties. In addition, it develops high end condominium projects, as well as engages in the provision of condominium juristic person management. Major Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MJD.BK.summary: Major Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of properties in Thailand. The company operates in three segments: Development of Properties for Sales, Hotel Business, and Rental Business. The company is also involved in the hotel, as well as properties rental and service businesses; and operates as an agent, representative, and advisor of real estate properties. In addition, it develops high end condominium projects, as well as engages in the provision of condominium juristic person management. Major Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MK-R.BK.long_name: M.K. Real Estate Development Public Company Limited
MK-R.BK.summary: M.K. Real Estate Development Public Company Limited engages in the property development business in Thailand. The company operates through five segments: Real Estate; Rental Warehouse, Factory and Others; Golf Services; Property Management; and Health and Wellness Center. It develops and sells land, houses, and condominiums; and provides property management services. The company is also involved in building and parking rental activities, as well as in the golf course business. In addition, it operates health and wellness centers. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NCH-R.BK.short_name: N. C. HOUSING PUBLIC COMPANY LI
NCH-R.BK.summary: N.C. Housing Public Company Limited operates as a property development company in Thailand. It develops and sells land, single detached houses, duplexes, townhouses, condominiums, and others; provides contractor, construction, and project and property management services; rents space in club houses, etc.; and operates health rehabilitation and senior care centers, etc. The company was founded in 1963 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand. N.C. Housing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of NCH 2555 Holding Company Limited.

NCH.BK.short_name: N. C. HOUSING PUBLIC COMPANY LI
NCH.BK.summary: N.C. Housing Public Company Limited operates as a property development company in Thailand. It develops and sells land, single detached houses, duplexes, townhouses, condominiums, and others; provides contractor, construction, and project and property management services; rents space in club houses, etc.; and operates health rehabilitation and senior care centers, etc. The company was founded in 1963 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand. N.C. Housing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of NCH 2555 Holding Company Limited.

NUSA-R.BK.summary: Nusasiri Public Company Limited develops properties in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Property Development, Rental and Service, and Cultural Theme-Park. It develops and sells land, houses, and condominiums units, as well as rents property. The company is also involved in cultural theme park, art cultural center, golf course, and hotel operations. In addition, it invests in hospital business; leases spaces; and rents vehicles. The company was formerly known as Angpao Assets Public Company Limited and changed its name to Nusasiri Public Company Limited in May 2012. Nusasiri Public Company Limited was founded in 1960 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NUSA.BK.summary: Nusasiri Public Company Limited develops properties in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Property Development, Rental and Service, and Cultural Theme-Park. It develops and sells land, houses, and condominiums units, as well as rents property. The company is also involved in cultural theme park, art cultural center, golf course, and hotel operations. In addition, it invests in hospital business; leases spaces; and rents vehicles. The company was formerly known as Angpao Assets Public Company Limited and changed its name to Nusasiri Public Company Limited in May 2012. Nusasiri Public Company Limited was founded in 1960 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVAH.F.long_name: Land and Houses Public Company Limited
NVAH.F.summary: Land and Houses Public Company Limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand and the United States. It operates in two segments, Real Estate Business, and Rental and Service Business. The Real Estate Business segment develops and sells single detached houses, townhouses, and residence condominium projects. The Rental and Service Business segment is involved in the rental of shopping malls, hotels, and apartments. The company also offers project administration and management, and investment advisory services. Land and Houses Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVD-R.BK.summary: Nirvana Daii Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells real estate properties. It also provides construction services; and distributes precast concrete products. The company was formerly known as Daii Group Public Company Limited and changed its name to Nirvana Daii Public Company Limited in May 2017. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Nirvana Daii Public Company Limited is a former subsidiary of Singha Estate Public Company Limited.

NVD.BK.summary: Nirvana Daii Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells real estate properties. It also provides construction services; and distributes precast concrete products. The company was formerly known as Daii Group Public Company Limited and changed its name to Nirvana Daii Public Company Limited in May 2017. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Nirvana Daii Public Company Limited is a former subsidiary of Singha Estate Public Company Limited.

NYVL.F.summary: Supalai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development of real estate projects for living and commercial purposes in Thailand, the Philippines, and Australia. It operates through Real Estate Business and Hotel Business and Management segments. The company owns and operates housing projects, including single detached houses, duplex houses, townhouses, and condominiums. It also develops and manages hotels and resorts; rents office buildings; and provides real estate project management. The company offers its services under the Supalai brand. Supalai Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ORI-R.BK.summary: Origin Property Public Company Limited develops properties in Thailand. The company develops residential condominium units; and sells land and house. It also provides rental agency, interior decoration, property management, and real estate related services; and invests in other companies. In addition, it engages in food and hotel business. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

PF-R.BK.summary: Property Perfect Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Property Development, Hotel, and Others. The company develops shopping malls and commercial areas; rents office buildings, assets, and shopping plazas; and offers apartment and construction services, as well as invests in other companies and projects. It is also involved in the hotel business, producing and assembling prefabricated building systems, and clubhouse management. Property Perfect Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PF.BK.summary: Property Perfect Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Property Development, Hotel, and Others. The company develops shopping malls and commercial areas; rents office buildings, assets, and shopping plazas; and offers apartment and construction services, as well as invests in other companies and projects. It is also involved in the hotel business, producing and assembling prefabricated building systems, and clubhouse management. Property Perfect Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PLAT-R.BK.long_name: The Platinum Group Public Company Limited
PLAT-R.BK.summary: The Platinum Group Public Company Limited engages in the real estate development and investment business in Thailand. The company develops and rents retail space in shopping centers, as well as offers related services; and operates hotel, and food and beverages centers. The Platinum Group Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PRECHA-R.BK.summary: Preecha Group Public Company Limited engages in the real estate business in Thailand. It develops and rents properties, as well as offers related services. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PRECHA.BK.summary: Preecha Group Public Company Limited engages in the real estate business in Thailand. It develops and rents properties, as well as offers related services. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PRIN-R.BK.summary: Prinsiri Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, leases, and sells real estate properties. The company is also involved in the construction distribution and acts as a contractor; and provision of real estate services. In addition, it generates and distributes electricity current from solar cell and alternative energy; and provides entertainment park and education center services, as well as food service in restaurant and food shop. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PRIN.BK.summary: Prinsiri Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, leases, and sells real estate properties. The company is also involved in the construction distribution and acts as a contractor; and provision of real estate services. In addition, it generates and distributes electricity current from solar cell and alternative energy; and provides entertainment park and education center services, as well as food service in restaurant and food shop. PROUD-R.BK.long_name: Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited
PROUD-R.BK.summary: Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited engages in the construction and real estate development businesses in Thailand. The company develops residential condominiums. It also acts as the construction contractor. The company was formerly known as Focus Development and Construction Public Company Limited and changed its name to Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited in May 2019. Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PROUD.BK.long_name: Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited
PROUD.BK.summary: Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited engages in the construction and real estate development businesses in Thailand. The company develops residential condominiums. It also acts as the construction contractor. The company was formerly known as Focus Development and Construction Public Company Limited and changed its name to Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited in May 2019. Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PSH-R.BK.summary: Pruksa Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of residential real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops townhouses, single houses, and condominiums. It also provides management, home decoration, and construction services; and operates hospitals and clinics, as well as place of examination and treatment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PSH.BK.summary: Pruksa Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of residential real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops townhouses, single houses, and condominiums. It also provides management, home decoration, and construction services; and operates hospitals and clinics, as well as place of examination and treatment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

QH-R.BK.summary: Quality Houses Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates in four segments: Real Estate Business, Hotel Business, Rental Business, and Others. The company develops and sells land and houses, and condominium units; rents office buildings; and services residential buildings. It also engages in hotel operations; management of serviced apartments; lease of land; and management of public utilities of real estate business and land owners, as well as the manufacture and distribution of precast concrete. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

QH.BK.summary: Quality Houses Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates in four segments: Real Estate Business, Hotel Business, Rental Business, and Others. The company develops and sells land and houses, and condominium units; rents office buildings; and services residential buildings. It also engages in hotel operations; management of serviced apartments; lease of land; and management of public utilities of real estate business and land owners, as well as the manufacture and distribution of precast concrete. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

RICHY-R.BK.summary: Richy Place 2002 Public Company Limited develops and sells property and condominiums in Thailand. It develops condominiums, homes, and others. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

RICHY.BK.summary: Richy Place 2002 Public Company Limited develops and sells property and condominiums in Thailand. It develops condominiums, homes, and others. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

RML-R.BK.summary: Raimon Land Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in property investment and development activities in Thailand. It develops and sells condominiums, and other housing and resort properties. The company also engages in the rental of office buildings, residential condominiums, and community malls; and property agency, hospitality, and food and beverage businesses. In addition, it offers real estate and online services. Raimon Land Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

RML.BK.summary: Raimon Land Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in property investment and development activities in Thailand. It develops and sells condominiums, and other housing and resort properties. The company also engages in the rental of office buildings, residential condominiums, and community malls; and property agency, hospitality, and food and beverage businesses. In addition, it offers real estate and online services. Raimon Land Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

S-R.BK.summary: Singha Estate Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and invests in real estate properties for rental and sale in Thailand and internationally. The company develops single detached houses, townhomes, home offices, and condominiums for sale; and owns commercial buildings, which include an office building, a retail space, and a mix-used building. It also engages in the provision of hotel, hotel management, and hospitality services; construction services; and manufacturing and trading, as well as management services for real estate. The company was formerly known as Rasa Property Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to Singha Estate Public Company Limited in September 2014. Singha Estate Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

S.BK.summary: Singha Estate Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and invests in real estate properties for rental and sale in Thailand and internationally. The company develops single detached houses, townhomes, home offices, and condominiums for sale; and owns commercial buildings, which include an office building, a retail space, and a mix-used building. It also engages in the provision of hotel, hotel management, and hospitality services; construction services; and manufacturing and trading, as well as management services for real estate. The company was formerly known as Rasa Property Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to Singha Estate Public Company Limited in September 2014. Singha Estate Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SA-R.BK.summary: Siamese Asset Public Company Limited operates as a property development company in Thailand. The company develops condominium, single house, town home, and home office projects. Siamese Asset Public Company Limited was founded in 2010 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SA.BK.summary: Siamese Asset Public Company Limited operates as a property development company in Thailand. The company develops condominium, single house, town home, and home office projects. Siamese Asset Public Company Limited was founded in 2010 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAMCO-R.BK.summary: Sammakorn Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development activities in Thailand. The company develops single houses, town homes, condominiums, and office parks. It also develops land into community malls; and offers real estate management and other related services. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAMCO.BK.summary: Sammakorn Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development activities in Thailand. The company develops single houses, town homes, condominiums, and office parks. It also develops land into community malls; and offers real estate management and other related services. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SC-R.BK.long_name: SC Asset Corporation Public Company Limited
SC-R.BK.summary: SC Asset Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate development company in Thailand. The company operates through Real Estates sales; Rental and Rendering of Services; and Consulting and Management Service segments. It develops and sells single detached houses, townhomes, and condominiums, as well as home offices; and rents office and technical buildings. It also provides consulting and management services. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SENA-R.BK.summary: Sena Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of properties in Thailand. The company operates through Property Development for Sales, Golf Course Services, and Services Apartment segments. It primarily develops single-detached houses, townhouses, commercial buildings, and condominiums; and rents apartment, small shopping center, and office building. The company is also involved in golf course; and juristic person management businesses. In addition, it manufactures and distributes electricity from solar energy; distributes prefab steel and construction materials, as well as solar panels and inverters, including solar system installment; provides tool rental machinery and equipment for electricity, and engineering services and construction work on solar energy; acts as a real estate agents and brokers; manages real estate; and trades in non-residential real estate property. The company was formerly known as Krungthep Keha Group Co., Ltd. Sena Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SENA.BK.summary: Sena Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of properties in Thailand. The company operates through Property Development for Sales, Golf Course Services, and Services Apartment segments. It primarily develops single-detached houses, townhouses, commercial buildings, and condominiums; and rents apartment, small shopping center, and office building. The company is also involved in golf course; and juristic person management businesses. In addition, it manufactures and distributes electricity from solar energy; distributes prefab steel and construction materials, as well as solar panels and inverters, including solar system installment; provides tool rental machinery and equipment for electricity, and engineering services and construction work on solar energy; acts as a real estate agents and brokers; manages real estate; and trades in non-residential real estate property. The company was formerly known as Krungthep Keha Group Co., Ltd. Sena Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SF-R.BK.long_name: Siam Future Development Public Company Limited
SF-R.BK.summary: Siam Future Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the rental of building space and provision of utility services in Thailand. The company is involved in the development and management of shopping centers; and installation of electricity and water meters. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 20 centers with gross leasable area of approximately 441,158 square meters. The company also provides utility services that comprise electricity, gas, water supply, and telephone services; and location procurement services. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SF.BK.long_name: Siam Future Development Public Company Limited
SF.BK.summary: Siam Future Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the rental of building space and provision of utility services in Thailand. The company is involved in the development and management of shopping centers; and installation of electricity and water meters. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 20 centers with gross leasable area of approximately 441,158 square meters. The company also provides utility services that comprise electricity, gas, water supply, and telephone services; and location procurement services. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SHREIT.BK.long_name: Strategic Hospitality Extendable Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
SHREIT.BK.summary: Strategic Hospitality Extendable Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust ("SHREIT") is a pioneering international REIT managed by Strategic Property Investors Company Limited. We provide investors with well-diversified portfolio of hospitality assets, access to younger and faster growing Mekong region countries through a regulated vehicle. SHREIT's initial portfolio is spread across key cities in Mekong region Â Ho Chi Minh City and Jakarta. Each of the asset in the initial portfolio is strategically located, urban focused, and fully differentiates itself from it competitors. The REIT's hotels are catered for different customer segments, ranging from economy to luxury, with a total of 632 rooms under management. The hotels are operated by top international hotel operators such as Accor and Frasers.

SIRI-R.BK.summary: Sansiri Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through Property Development; Building Management, Project Management and Real Estate Brokerage; Hotel Management; and Other segments. The Property Development segment develops land and housing projects, as well as residential condominium projects; and rents serviced apartments and office buildings. The Building Management, Project Management and Real Estate Brokerage segment provides building management, property project management, and real estate brokerage services. The Hotel Management segment manages hotels. The Other segment is involved in the hotel and education businesses. The company also offers events management, restaurant club management, and administrative services, as well as distributes standard branded products. Sansiri Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIRI.BK.summary: Sansiri Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through Property Development; Building Management, Project Management and Real Estate Brokerage; Hotel Management; and Other segments. The Property Development segment develops land and housing projects, as well as residential condominium projects; and rents serviced apartments and office buildings. The Building Management, Project Management and Real Estate Brokerage segment provides building management, property project management, and real estate brokerage services. The Hotel Management segment manages hotels. The Other segment is involved in the hotel and education businesses. The company also offers events management, restaurant club management, and administrative services, as well as distributes standard branded products. Sansiri Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPALI-R.BK.summary: Supalai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development of real estate projects for living and commercial purposes in Thailand, the Philippines, and Australia. It operates through Real Estate Business and Hotel Business and Management segments. The company owns and operates housing projects, including single detached houses, duplex houses, townhouses, and condominiums. It also develops and manages hotels and resorts; rents office buildings; and provides real estate project management. The company offers its services under the Supalai brand. Supalai Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPALI.BK.summary: Supalai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development of real estate projects for living and commercial purposes in Thailand, the Philippines, and Australia. It operates through Real Estate Business and Hotel Business and Management segments. The company owns and operates housing projects, including single detached houses, duplex houses, townhouses, and condominiums. It also develops and manages hotels and resorts; rents office buildings; and provides real estate project management. The company offers its services under the Supalai brand. Supalai Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPI-R.BK.long_name: Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited
SPI-R.BK.summary: Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in the investment, rental and services, and real estate businesses in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Investment in Consumer Goods Business; Investment in Food and Beverage Business; and Industrial Park Development and Investment in Other Businesses. It invests in hotel and golf course; leases land and buildings; and provides utility, electricity, and stream services. The company offers consumer products, including textile and fashion; household and baby-care products, such as Lipon F dish-washing agent, Pao detergent, Systema, and Kodomo products; oral-care products, which includes sanitary napkins, and Elleair wet wipes; beauty and cosmetics products under the BSC Cosmetology, Arty Professional by BSC, Sheene, Pure Care, and Mistine brand names; and other consumer products. In addition, it is involved in the operation of four industrial parks in Si Racha District, Chonburi Province; Kabinburi District, Prachinburi Province; Lamphun District, Lamphun Province; and Mae Sot District, Tak Province. Further, the company provides consultation, business planning, project execution, and trademark services. It also exports consumer goods; and acts as an agent. The company was formerly known as Saha Pathana Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited in 1984. Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPI.BK.long_name: Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited
SPI.BK.summary: Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in the investment, rental and services, and real estate businesses in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Investment in Consumer Goods Business; Investment in Food and Beverage Business; and Industrial Park Development and Investment in Other Businesses. It invests in hotel and golf course; leases land and buildings; and provides utility, electricity, and stream services. The company offers consumer products, including textile and fashion; household and baby-care products, such as Lipon F dish-washing agent, Pao detergent, Systema, and Kodomo products; oral-care products, which includes sanitary napkins, and Elleair wet wipes; beauty and cosmetics products under the BSC Cosmetology, Arty Professional by BSC, Sheene, Pure Care, and Mistine brand names; and other consumer products. In addition, it is involved in the operation of four industrial parks in Si Racha District, Chonburi Province; Kabinburi District, Prachinburi Province; Lamphun District, Lamphun Province; and Mae Sot District, Tak Province. Further, the company provides consultation, business planning, project execution, and trademark services. It also exports consumer goods; and acts as an agent. The company was formerly known as Saha Pathana Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited in 1984. Saha Pathana Inter-Holding Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPRIME.BK.short_name: S PRIME GROWTH LEASEHOLD REAL E
SPRIME.BK.long_name: S Prime Growth Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
SPRIME.BK.summary: S Prime Growth Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust operates as a real estate investment trust in Thailand. It invests in office buildings. The company qualifies as a real estate investment trust for federal income tax purposes. It generally would not be subject to federal corporate income taxes if it distributes at least 90% of its taxable income to its stockholders. S Prime Growth Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SRIPANWA.BK.long_name: Sri panwa Hospitality Real Estate Investment Trust
SRIPANWA.BK.summary: Sri panwa Hotel Property Fund specializes in investing in real estate.

SSTRT.BK.short_name: SUB SRI THAI REAL ESTATE INVEST
SSTRT.BK.long_name: Sub Sri Thai Real Estate Investment Trust
SSTRT.BK.summary: Sub Sri Thai Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by SST REIT Management Company Limited. The firm policy is to invest in main assets that are immovable property or lease rights of immovable property (including sub-lease right to of immovable property) and assets that are the fixtures or accessories of such immovable property, including constructions and other assets that are the fixtures of the land and buildings, instruments, accessories, working systems in the building and other asset released, connected and necessary for exploration of such immovable property. Sub Sri Thai Real Estate Investment Trust was formed on December 13, 2017 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TITLE-R.BK.long_name: Rhom Bho Property Public Company Limited
TITLE-R.BK.summary: Rhom Bho Property Public Company Limited operates as a property development company in Thailand. It develops and sells residential condominiums. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TITLE.BK.long_name: Rhom Bho Property Public Company Limited
TITLE.BK.summary: Rhom Bho Property Public Company Limited operates as a property development company in Thailand. It develops and sells residential condominiums. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPRIME.BK.long_name: Thailand Prime Property Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
TPRIME.BK.summary: Thailand Prime Property Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by SCCP REIT Company Limited. The firm invest in leasehold rights over the Mercury Tower Project and acquiring at least 99.99 per cent. of shares of Exchange Tower Co.,Ltd which owns the Exchange Tower Project. Thailand Prime Property Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

U-R.BK.summary: U City Public Company Limited operates as a diversified real estate investment and development company in Thailand and internationally. The company operates in three segments: Hotel Business; Rental and Management Business; and Real Estate for Sale Business. It develops, rents, and sells real estate properties; leases land and structures; invests in securities; and manages and operates golf course and sports club, as well as manages and operates hotels; owns property; and engages in the office rental business. The company was formerly known as Natural Park Public Company Limited and changed its name to U City Public Company Limited in April 2015. U City Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UNZ.SG.summary: Univentures Public Company Limited engages in the property development business in Thailand. It develops and sells condominiums, as well as rents office buildings. The company also manufactures and sells zinc oxide and chemicals; and provides time recorders, parking control equipment, and electronics equipment. In addition, it offers finance and investment consulting services; investment and management consulting; and other related services. Further, the company operates as a manager of trusts for real estate investments; and invests in energy services, hotel, and other companies. Additionally, it acts as a broker and agent in real estate-related business; and offers corporate registration services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Univentures Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Adelfos Company Limited.

UV-R.BK.summary: Univentures Public Company Limited engages in the property development business in Thailand. It develops and sells condominiums, as well as rents office buildings. The company also manufactures and sells zinc oxide and chemicals; and provides time recorders, parking control equipment, and electronics equipment. In addition, it offers finance and investment consulting services; investment and management consulting; and other related services. Further, the company operates as a manager of trusts for real estate investments; and invests in energy services, hotel, and other companies. Additionally, it acts as a broker and agent in real estate-related business; and offers corporate registration services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Univentures Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Adelfos Company Limited.

WHA-R.BK.summary: WHA Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, rents, and sells lands, buildings, factories, warehouses, and other properties in Thailand and internationally. It develops and manages properties in industrial estates and industrial zones. The company also provides raw and industrial water; wastewater treatment services; and maintenance services to industrial estate customers, such as power plants, steel mills, and automotive and petrochemical industries. In addition, the company operates power projects; and provides digital services, data center, Internet connection, and other IT services. WHA Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Muang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

WHABT.BK.long_name: WHA Business Complex Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
WHABT.BK.summary: WHA Business Complex Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust specializes in real estate investing.

WHART.BK.long_name: WHA Premium Growth Freehold And Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
WHART.BK.summary: WHA Premium Growth Freehold And Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by WHA Real Estate Management Company Limited. The firm invests mostly in property or property leasehold rights and generate benefit from such properties including to improve, alter, develop or dispose other assets in which the Trust invest or possess whatsoever lease, sub-lease or sale or other process for the benefit of the property and create the revenue and return to the Trust and the unitholders. WHA Premium Growth Freehold And Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust was formed on December 8, 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

WIN-R.BK.long_name: Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited
WIN-R.BK.summary: Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited sells and rents custom duty free zone areas for the commercial and industrial activities worldwide. The company's facilities include customs office at site, logistics solution teams, executive offices, staff accommodations, conference rooms, and food centers. Its total land area is 109,174 square meters with factory and warehouse buildings for rent of 42,754 square meters, depot area of 15,175 square meters, and a three-storey office building of 4,011 square meters. The company also operates as an auto dealer for new, old, and multipurpose cars; and other vehicles, as well as spare parts and accessories. In addition, it produces and distributes electricity from solar energy; produces and distributes water; and operates and manages properties and assets, as well as engages in the construction business. The company was formerly known as Capetronic International (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited in October 2013. Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bang Pakong, Thailand.
